testcaseName: #1 at 3 months and 3 days-catchup- #2 recommended at +28 days
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child is administered the first dose of the Hib vaccine at 3 months and 3 days of age that the dose is valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
